lines.gurmukhi: jYsy mwqw ipqw pwlk Anyk suq; Ank suqn pY n qYsy hoie n AwveI [

Unknown.translation: As parents bring up and care for many of their children yet £hose children do not reciprocate the same way;

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: ijs qrHwˆ mwqw ipqw Anyk puqRwˆ dI pRiqpwlw sMBwl KwqrdwrI krdy hn; prMqU puqrwˆ pwsoˆ aus pRkwr nhIˆ ho AOˆdw ik auh BI ausy qrHwˆ hI mwipAwˆ dI syvw krn[

lines.gurmukhi: jYsy mwqw ipqw icq cwhq hY suqn kau; qYsy n suqn icq cwh aupjwveI [

Unknown.translation: As parents love their wards from the core of their hearts, the same intensity of love cannot be generated in the hearts of the children.

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: ijs qrHwˆ mwpy ic`q ivc bictwˆ nUM locdy cwhuMdy rihMdy hn, aus qrHwˆ dI cwhnwˆ mwipAwˆ dI Kwqr b`icAwˆ dy ic`qwˆ AMqr nhIˆ aumigAw krdI[

lines.gurmukhi: jYsy mwqw ipqw suq suK duK sogwnMd; duK suK mY n qYsy suq ThrwveI [

Unknown.translation: As parents feel delighted on the happy occasions of their children and are distressed when they face tribulations, but the children do not feel the reciprocal intensity for their parents;

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: ijs qrHwˆ mwqw ipqw puqrwˆ dy suK duK ibAwipAwˆ suK smyˆ suKI qy duK smyˆ duKI ho ky AwnMdvwn qy sogwqur ho jwXw krdy hn, aus qrwˆ b`cy mwipAwˆ dy suK duK smyˆ KuSI qy rMg nUM Apxy AMdr nhI ilAwXw krdy[

lines.gurmukhi: jYsy mn bc kRm isKnu lufwvY gur; qYsy gur syvw gurisK n ihqwveI [101[

Unknown.translation: As Satguru Ji pamper and cuddle the Sikhs with mind, words and deeds, similarly a Sikh cannot express in reciprocation these boons of Satguru Ji with equal intensity. (101)
